entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Conversion errors in debugger are unhelpful #25600
    customer-reported
  • Remove useless Convert node when the type mapping doesn't change #25597
    type-enhancement, area-query
  • How to find out which column(s) violated which constraints and checks when calling SaveChangesAsync() #25592
    closed-external, customer-reported
  • How to find out which column(s) violated constraints and checks when calling SaveChangesAsync() #25590
    closed-external, customer-reported
  • Handle old migrations with 32-bit identity seed values #25589
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-migrations-seeding, area-sqlserver
  • OwnedType use HasData() throw a InvalidOperationException #25586
    customer-reported

Closed

  • Compiled model with value converters #25187
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc1
  • Consider un-deleting an entity when it has been orphaned and then reparented #19568
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-change-tracking, 6.0.0
  • Compiled models don't have the correct default namespace/directory #25059
    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2
  • Compiled model has invalid using directive when model is not in a namespace #25058
    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2
  • Should EntityEntry's Expression-based parameters be nullable-friendly? #24659
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-change-tracking, 6.0.0
  • Migration: `HasData` generates migration with `object[,]` instead of `object?[,]` #25588
    closed-duplicate, customer-reported
  • Find on Cosmos throws CosmosException when entity isn't found #24184
    closed-duplicate, area-query, area-cosmos
  • Regression in model building perf #20672
    type-bug, area-perf, closed-fixed, area-model-building, punted-for-5.0, 6.0.0-preview7
  • Contains() in many to many relationships #24470
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • OData - GroupBy with empty key is not working correctly #24561
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0

Updated

  • `Optimize-DbContext` Does Not Fully Qualify Types, Resulting in Compile Errors #25523
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc1
  • Internal exceptions when using .AsSplitQuery #25225
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Allow query tags to be forced inside generated SQL to prevent SQL Server from stripping them from "query text entries" #20105
    type-enhancement, consider-for-current-release, customer-reported, Backlog
  • AsSplitQuery sporadically missing navigation properties #25556
    customer-reported
  • 6.0 API Reviews #24743
    type-enhancement, area-global, 6.0.0
  • Optimistic Offline Lock #2195
    type-enhancement, consider-for-current-release, area-save-changes, area-sqlite, Backlog
  • Using Cosmos provider OrderBy owned property throw exception togheter with OData #24510
    closed-could-not-reproduce, area-query
  • Add an IncludeInner method #24955
    type-enhancement, area-perf, propose-close, customer-reported, area-query, Backlog
  • Migrations and Nullable Reference Types #18950
    type-enhancement, breaking-change, consider-for-current-release, customer-reported, area-migrations, punted-for-6.0
  • EF Core 5.0.1 problem with enum store in tinyint #23858
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, area-vb, 6.0.0
  • Query/Table Hints (raw SQL, such as OPTIONs) #6717
    type-enhancement, area-query, area-relational-mapping, Backlog
  • Convert node introduced to upcast IPAddress.Loopback causes translation failure #21159
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Query: Consider translating String.Equals(String, StringComparison) for selected values of StringComparison #1222
    type-enhancement, needs-design, area-query, Backlog
  • Why are AppendIdentityWhereCondition and AppendRowsAffectedWhereCondition abstract and rest is virtual? #10431
    type-cleanup, providers-beware, needs-design, area-save-changes
  • Improve data access performance #24110
    Epic, Epics
  • Query: NRE when trying to project count of navigation typed as ICollection<T> #22701
    type-bug, verify-fixed, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Frequent deadlocks on concurrent inserts with identity columns #25345
    customer-reported, area-save-changes, area-sqlserver, consider-for-next-release, Backlog
  • EF Core database insert fails when table has a SQL INSTEAD OF trigger #12064
    type-bug, needs-design, customer-reported, punted-for-2.2, punted-for-3.0, area-save-changes, 6.0.0
  • Allow opt-out of rows affected check #10443
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, area-save-changes, Backlog
  • Various model building API issues #22414
    type-enhancement, area-model-building, consider-for-next-release, Backlog
  • EF Core Cosmos: Owned Embedded id property not persisted #25232
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-cosmos, 6.0.0
  • LINQ query works in 3.1 and fails in 5.0 rc1: ArgumentException: Argument types do not match #22758
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a pubternal way to namespace-qualify ambiguous types in compiled model. #25605
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25602
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #25593
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Support value conversion for ReadOnlyIPAddress #25587
    auto-merge
  • Query: Don't expand include on entity reference which will be convert… #25585

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #25604
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25603
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #25594
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Correct nullability annotation for ReferenceEntry, RC1 #25598
  • Fix some test determinism issue #25572
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25596
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Undelete an entity when it has been orphaned and then reparented #25574
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Revert ProviderCodeGenerator.RelationalDependencies change #25595
  • Migrations Bundles: Address API Review feedback #25580
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25599
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Change the default subfolder/subnamespace for compiled models to CompiledModels #25584
  • Correct nullability annotation for ReferenceEntry #25591
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25573
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'main' #25579
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25571
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25582
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Rename Scalars to DefaultTypeMapping #25583
  • Query: Add regression test for Contains on skip collection navigation #25578
    auto-merge
  • Query: Remove unnecessary convert to IEnumerable for OData #25577
    auto-merge

Updated

  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25606
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: Allow using STET overload for Set in query filter/defining query #25581
  • [release/3.1] Update SQLite dependencies to 2.0.4 #25550
    Servicing-approved, 3.1.x
  • Tweaks to ValueComparer nullability #24410
